item.title: Exploratory Analysis and Concepts in Water Resource
Automated Reports with Parameters
item.description: Â¿What is an automated report with parameters? Well, in simple terms an automated report is a document in any format (.docx, .ppt, .pdf, .html and so on) that can be update in a specific time window iteratively while is required, in the case refer to parameters, there are some variables that can be change, for example, basin, sub-basin, department, province, geological horizont, lake, etc. (espacial) and hourly, daily, monthly , etc.
